<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Fetches report run status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/rest/api/v1/governance/data/reports/{id}/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches the status of the run corresponding to the report-id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The id of the report to get run status for.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Fetches status of report run.","content":{"application/json; charset=UTF-8":{"schema":{"properties":{"status":{"type":"string","enum":["PENDING","SUCCESS","FAILURE","CANCELLED","CANCELLING","ACTIVE"]},"startTime":{"type":"string","format":"iso-date-time","description":"The timestamp at which the report's run/scan began."}},"title":"ReportStatusResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Permissions error"},"500":{"description":"Internal error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
